============================================
core/tf/assignment
============================================

module test;
    initial begin
        k = $random;
    end
endmodule

----

(source_file
  (module_declaration
    (module_ansi_header
      (module_keyword)
      name: (simple_identifier))
    (initial_construct
      (statement_or_null
        (statement
          (statement_item
            (seq_block
              (statement_or_null
                (statement
                  (statement_item
                    (blocking_assignment
                      (operator_assignment
                        (variable_lvalue
                          (hierarchical_identifier
                            (simple_identifier)))
                        (assignment_operator)
                        (expression
                          (primary
                            (function_subroutine_call
                              (subroutine_call
                                (system_tf_call
                                  (system_tf_identifier))))))))))))))))))
